## Read One Post

```{r}
library(pttR)

post_df <- get_post("https://www.ptt.cc/bbs/Gossiping/M.1534490816.A.A3A.html")

post_df
```

### Examine Post Comment

```{r}
post_df$comment[[1]]
```


## Read Multiple Posts

Information of popular boards on PTT is contained in the package. Use the code below to get the data:
```{r}
df <- hotboards()
df
```
